name: MCP Bridge
description: Bridge tools from external MCP servers into OpenClaw. Auto-discovers tools via listTools().

servers.description: MCP servers to bridge. Keys are server names (e.g. 'atlassian', 'github').

url.description: Endpoint URL for the MCP server.

enabled.description: Set false to disable this server. Defaults to true.

timeout.description: Discovery timeout in milliseconds. Defaults to 10000.

prefix.description: Optional prefix for tool names to avoid collisions across servers.

transport.description: MCP transport type. 'sse' for legacy SSE, 'http' for Streamable HTTP. Defaults to 'sse'.

headers.description: Custom HTTP headers (e.g. API keys) sent with every request.
